ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup

cookingTips: Brown the ground beef thoroughly and drain all excess fat before combining with other ingredients
Keep the dip warm in a slow cooker for serving to maintain its creamy texture
Stir occasionally while serving to prevent the cheese from settling at the bottom
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook understand how to layer flavors in this simple party dip and keep it properly heated for serving.
